title: um so i just played my first ranked game at 8:42 am on the 12/11/2015 why was it not a promo game

replies.body: Care to elaborate a bit more?
went into a ranked game was not a promo game just a normal ranked game
Were you supposed to be in your promo's?
yes I have not played ranked yet I was gona see how I did before season 6

If you haven't played ranked yet in season 5 then would have play a provisional match, you need to play 10 provisional games before you are placed in a division, after winning matches you receive LP (amount received will vary based on MMR), once you acquire 100LP   for your current division you will then be put into promos, win 2 out of 3 promo games and you will advance to the next division.

At the beginning of season 6 your rank will reset and you will have to complete the process again.

hope this clears things up
I'm assuming you meant provisionals? Do you already have a rank? Did you gain any LP?
You having trouble at home with mum and dad or?
